backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining dairy management data types (Farmer, CollectionEntry, Transaction, ProductSale, InventoryEntry) and backend functions for farmer management, milk collection, transactions, inventory, and sales with pagination support (pageSize=50).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: pagination for DataReports and FarmerTransactionHistory, lazy loading for bill generation, and React Query caching strategy for frequently accessed data.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components describing keyboard navigation patterns, pagination implementations, lazy loading strategies, form flows, and accessibility features across the dairy management application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI elements (background, foreground, primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, borders, charts, sidebar).
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the React application with viewport meta tag, title "ANMOL DAIRY LIFE", and script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component with three-tab navigation (Dairy, Transactions, Settings), global keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl+1/2/3, '?'), skip-to-content link, arrow key tab navigation, and hero background image.
frontend/src/components/dairy/BillGenera: Component for generating and printing farmer bills for a date range, displaying milk collection entries with totals, weights, and amounts. Supports keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl+P) and includes print-specific styling.
frontend/src/components/dairy/CashModule: Component for recording cash transactions (payments and receipts) for farmers, with transaction type selection and optional comments. Supports Enter key submission and arrow key navigation.
frontend/src/components/dairy/DairySecti: Main dairy module container with tabbed navigation between Milk Collection, Bill, Data Reports, Sell, and Cash sections. Implements keyboard shortcuts and arrow key navigation between tabs.
frontend/src/components/dairy/DataReport: Component for viewing and filtering milk collection data by date and session (morning/evening/both), displaying paginated tables with totals and averages. Supports arrow key pagination.
frontend/src/components/dairy/MilkCollec: Form for recording milk collection entries with farmer lookup, weight/fat/SNF inputs, and preview dialog before saving. Implements Enter key navigation between fields and session-based data display.
frontend/src/components/dairy/SellModule: Component for recording product sales with optional customer ID lookup, product selection from inventory, quantity/price inputs, and bill printing functionality. Handles sale submission with validation and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/dairy/SessionEnt: Displays a table of milk collection entries for a specific session (morning/evening), showing farmer details, milk type, weight, FAT/SNF percentages, and calculated amounts. Fetches collections and farmer data to populate the table.
frontend/src/components/KeyboardShortcut: Dialog component displaying comprehensive keyboard shortcuts documentation organized by category (Global Navigation, Dairy Section, Forms & Dialogs, Search & Lists, Print & Export, Tab Navigation).
frontend/src/components/settings/FarmerM: Manages farmer records with search functionality, add/edit dialogs for farmer details (name, phone, milk type, customer ID), and displays farmer list with balance information. Includes keyboard shortcuts (Ctrl+F for search) and focus management.
frontend/src/components/settings/Invento: Handles inventory operations with dialogs for adding new products and updating stock quantities. Displays inventory table showing product names and current quantities with keyboard navigation support.
frontend/src/components/settings/RateSet: Provides UI for updating VLC (cow) and Thekadari (buffalo) milk rates, displaying current rates and allowing independent updates for each type with validation and Enter key submission.
frontend/src/components/settings/Setting: Tab container component that organizes settings into three sections (Farmers, Rate Settings, Inventory) with keyboard navigation support (arrow keys, Enter/Space) and proper ARIA attributes for accessibility.
frontend/src/components/transactions/Far: Displays paginated transaction history for a specific farmer with PDF generation and SMS sharing capabilities. Includes keyboard navigation for pagination and fetches all transactions when generating PDFs.
frontend/src/components/transactions/Tra: Main transactions view with searchable farmer list and arrow key navigation. Allows selecting a farmer to view their transaction history with Ctrl+F search shortcut.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, creating authenticated or anonymous actors and invalidating dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useArrowKeyNavigation: Custom hook providing arrow key navigation (up/down) and Enter key selection for list items with focus tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useDairyKeyboardShort: Implements Ctrl/Cmd keyboard shortcuts for dairy section navigation (M for milk collection, B for bill, D for data, S for sell, C for cash).
frontend/src/hooks/useGlobalKeyboardShor: Provides global keyboard shortcuts for main navigation (Ctrl+1/2/3 for sections) and help dialog (? key).
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state and identity persistence with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralized React Query hooks for all backend data operations including farmers, rates, collections, transactions, inventory, and sales with caching and mutation strategies.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom design tokens for light/dark themes using OKLCH color space, accessibility focus styles, and print-specific styles for bill generation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication.
frontend/src/utils/calculations.ts: Utility functions for milk billing calculations including VLC and Thekadari formulas, amount calculations based on fat/SNF content, and session determination logic.
frontend/src/utils/formatters.ts: Formatting utilities for displaying currency, dates, times, and less/add values with proper localization for Indian format.
frontend/src/utils/pdfGenerator.ts: Generates printable HTML transaction history reports for farmers including balance, transaction details, and formatted styling for PDF output.
frontend/src/utils/smsHelper.ts: Helper functions to construct SMS URIs and open native SMS apps with pre-filled phone numbers and messages.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme with OKLCH colors, typography, animations, and design system tokens for the application.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking architectural decisions, known performance issues with large datasets, and pending feature requests for pagination and lazy loading optimizations.
